product_name: Adventure Medical Kits UltraLight / Watertight .7 First-Aid Kit
long_description: Pared down to a weight-saving bare minimum, this Adventure Medical Ultralight / Watertight .7 first-aid kit contains the most essential supplies. Designed for life in the bottom of the pack, zippered ripstop silnylon outer bag has 2 inner DryFlex(TM) watertight pouches to ensure contents are kept clean and dry. Wound care items: 3 butterfly closure strips, 2 triple antibiotic ointments, 3 antiseptic wipes and 1 pair of nitrile gloves. Bandages: 8 sterile dressings, 2 non-adherent sterile dressings, 2 conforming gauze bandages, 5 adhesive bandages and 3 knuckle bandages. 10 yards adhesive tape, 1 elastic bandage, 11 precut and shaped moleskin pieces and 3 alcohol swabs. Medications: 6 ibuprofen, 2 aspirin, 2 antihistamine and 2 AfterBite(R) sting-relief wipes. Other equipment: splinter picker forceps, 3 safety pins and a 26 x 2 in. roll of duct tape.
short_description: Pared down to a weight-saving bare minimum, this Adventure Medical Ultralight / Watertight .7 first-aid kit contains the most essential supplies.
